1038510.name: Dies irae ~Amantes amentes~ - Original Soundtrack
1038510.description:
Contains the original soundtrack for "Dies irae ~Amantes amentes~" as DLC. Contains all vocal themes/BGM used in-game.
*The DLC will provide these tracks in MP3 and FLAC format.
